title: layout property
description: The layout property can be used to create layout slides
contents:
The layout property comes from the remark library. It setting layout: true makes the current slide a layout slide, which is omitted from the slideshow and serves as the default template used for all subsequent slides.
Setting layout: false reverts to using no default template.
